name: The Legend of Zelda Ballad of The Goddess
synopsis: See The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword Main Theme performed by a full orchestra in 3D*. This and other songs were included on a CD packed with the Legend of Zelda™: Skyward Sword on the Wii™ console, released in Dec. 2011. *This video was also available via the Nintendo Video application in 2011.
